Package anl.verdi.formula

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Formula
    Encapsulates a pave style formula and its evaluation.
    FormulaParser
    Interface for classes that implement formula parsing and evaluation.
    FormulaRange
    Placeholder for now, but the idea is that holds an axis range in such a way that the range can be converted between different datasets.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultFormula
    Formula implementation that produces data suitable for a tile plot.
    DefaultParser  
    FormulaFactory
    Factory for producing formulas for different type data plots.
    FormulaTests  
    FormulaValidator
    Validates a formula for unit, layer, domain and timestep coherence.
    FormulaVariable  
    SimpleParser
    Simple parser just for testing.
    TestData  
    ValidationResult
    Encapsulates the result of validating a Formula.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Formula.Type  
    ValidationResult.Status  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalFormulaException
    Signals a problem with a formula, either in its construction or execution.
